label: 会昌分類集
対訳語: Classified literary works of the Hui-ch'ang era
本: Sugawara no Michizane and the Early Heian Court . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
見出し読み: かいしょうぶんるいじゅう
説明文: Koreyoshi's final anthology.  A mommoth work in seventy chapters, [it] was probably a collection of works written during the Hui-ch'ang era (841-847) of the T'ang dynasty. [菅原是善]
